title: Fupre Chess Player Database
description: Problem: scattered player records and pairings. Solution: a lightweight web app to register players, record results, and generate standings. Impact: faster tournament ops, clean export to CSV/JSON.

title: Proudcore Deliveries PWA
description: Problem: unassigned orders and manual rider dispatch. Solution: PWA with order queue and nearest-rider assignment. Impact: reduced dispatch time and higher delivery reliability.

title: Tactics Trainer (Mini)
description: Problem: inconsistent daily tactics. Solution: micro-tactics widget with spaced repetition seeds. Impact: improved pattern retention and solve speed.

title: Personal Analytics Dashboard
description: Problem: multiple trackers across tools. Solution: single dashboard aggregating habits, coding time, and match results. Impact: quick weekly reviews and goal alignment.
